name: Australis menu List view
description:
A list view for Australis Panel Menu.
Known issues : - SDK icons look weird
additional_info:
Update 03/05 :
- Fixed zoom and copy controls bug
- Tweaked some icons

Update 13/03 :
- Fixed for latest Nightlies
- Now works with menu popups

discussions.name: Awesome. Not sure why Firefox tried going touch optimized.
